data: Welcome to Next House! We're so happy to have you here for CPW!
announcements/next.png
Reserve your ticket for Next Act tonight: tinyurl.com/nactdrowsy
Next Act is currently showing! Please be quiet near the theater area and do not go through any curtains.
Next Act is currently running! Please quietly pass through the courtyard to access the rest of the house.
Bubble Tea Social is in the Country Kitchen! Follow instructions to go through the courtyard, then go downstairs.
Bubble Tea Social is in the Country Kitchen! Pass through the TFL, then go downstairs.
Next Big Thing is currently on hold due to weather. Updates will be posted here!
Next Big Thing is rescheduled to tonight, party starts in the courtyard at 10:30pm!
Poker Chips and Chips is in Dining! Follow instructions to go through the courtyard.
Next Big Thing is rescheduled to tonight, party is on in the courtyard!
announcements/courtyard-1.jpg
announcements/courtyard-2.jpg
Next Sing will be starting at 10:30pm, right after Next Act finishes. Thanks for your patience!
Next Sing will be starting at 10:30pm, right after Next Act finishes. Stop by the Country Kitchen and get pancakes while you wait!
Final show tonight! Reserve your ticket for Next Act: tinyurl.com/nactdrowsy
Due to weather, Next Art is being moved to 3W Main Lounge. Go up the stairs to the 3rd floor, then turn right!
Next Haunt is in the Private Dining Room! Follow instructions to go through the courtyard, then enter dining.
Midnight Pancakes is in the Country Kitchen! Follow instructions to go through the courtyard, then go downstairs.
Thanks for visiting Next House! We loved having you for CPW and hope to see you here in the future!
Thanks for attending Next House CPW events! Travel safely and we hope to see you back in August!
